H0.text: Which Liverpool player scored two goals in both the semi-final and final of the FA Cup in 1986. Kenny Dalglish

H1.text: Which Liverpool player scored two goals in both the semi-final and final of the FA Cup in 1986. John Aldridge

H2.text: Which Liverpool player scored two goals in both the semi-final and final of the FA Cup in 1986. Peter Beardsley

H3.text: Which Liverpool player scored two goals in both the semi-final and final of the FA Cup in 1986. IAN RUSH

A5.text: With Wimbledon 1–0 up in the FA Cup final at Wembley
